full_text.0: @nazly Curious, why should everything be in Colombo?
full_text.1: Words cannot express our heartbreak as we come to grips with the loss of wonderful alumna Nirmani Liyanage. Bright, funny, hard-working, charitable, kind ... she is gone too soon with so much yet to accomplish.  We mourn with those in Colombo. https://t.co/Vw7HNjDxYM
full_text.3: What's the best place to get Cakes and Fried Rice (With Chop suey and all) in Colombo? #HelpLK #Help
